front.title: IPv6 over IPv4 tunnels for home to Internet access

abstract.t: Many Internet access providers for residential customers provideonly one dynamic IPv4 address to their clients. This documentproposes in such cases to use an IPv6 over IPv4 tunnel with IPSec(this gives a static global routable address or prefix with security)and to implement the processing at the server end of unsolicitedneighbor advertisements for overriding the IPv4 address at theclient end when it changes.
